column4: question: I have added in the last 4 months extra hdd, a sb live soundcard to replace onboard and a ethernet/network card. Will this put too much strain on a 300w ps?
I don't think it would be
I didn't think so...ps is not seeming to be overworked or overheated...but fans are noisy and prob need a replacement then
fans can lower in noise with a drop of oil in the bearing
is there a lot of dust on your fans/hardware??? (better remove that)
that does sound like it's needing a replacement, fans aren't that expensive though
I has similar permissions prob with fat32 partition. I ahd to create a folder on drive thru ubuntu in order to transfer files between. Original folders retained permissions from windows
could you explain more clearly??? (I'm kinda sleepy and originally dutch, so you confuse me)
this isn't truly about file sharing... I just wanna listen to music
no it isn't... it's my Apple iPod music player that has FAT partition
it's not specifically the iPod.... it can't read any files
that's because it just crashes on startup
is the ipod automounting when plugged in?
yes it is, why?
jsut trying to see what is wrong
nothing is wrong anymore... I just using xmms now.. kinda used to winamp so just as easy
were you trying amarok?
what's amarok?
there are libraries in development to do that though
did you try live cd and see if it would work?
yes
